InitShareText.en: I have pinned {cities} cities and {countries} countries on my travel map

NoSocNetShare.en: You have currently no social networks paired with your account, add Facebook or Twitter to your account to be able to share your travel map. You can do this in user settings.

ClickCheck.en: Click here to mark this city as visited

ClickDelete.en: Click here to remove this city from visited cities

DelDialogBody.en: Do you want to remove this city from the list of cities you've visited ?
